content: this legal document discusses the progress of a legal case involving three parties referred to as rc rp and vb these parties acquired shares of a plot of land in castelfidardo which includes a construction project for an industrial warehouse with exclusive courtyards the document provides specific details about each unit of the warehouse and their boundaries the parties agree to terminate their joint ownership and allocate the shares as follows rc receives the first share rp receives the second share and vb receives the third share the document also specifies the value of each share
